H0.text: They all live on land is a common characteristic of mammals that Nicole is learning about when studying the characteristics of different vertebrates.

H1.text: They all have hair or fur is a common characteristic of mammals that Nicole is learning about as part of studying the characteristics of different vertebrates.

H2.text: They are all good swimmers is a common characteristic of mammals that Nicole is learning about as part of her study of vertebrate characteristics.

H3.text: They all live in warm climates are a common characteristic of mammals that Nicole is learning about.

A4.text: No animals other than mammals have hair. It is a definitive characteristic of the class, though some mammals have very little.

A5.text: Fully aquatic mammals, the cetaceans and sirenians, have lost their legs and have a tail fin to propel themselves through the water.
